responses.rationale: The segment describes an experiment setup, not factual reporting of prices, economic data, or numerical metrics.
The segment describes an experiment outcome (animals became ill), not factual reporting of prices, economic data, or numerical metrics.
The segment describes an experiment setup, not factual reporting of prices, economic data, or numerical metrics.
